title: Defiance
description: Shiovra has been named High Priestess of the village Tara, but she quickly finds herself hunted by the Milidh, a clan born of war and vengeance. With the safety of Tara at stake, it is decided that she is to seek aid from her betrothed, one she considers the enemy.At her side is Odhr√°n, a Milidh warrior sworn to protect her and determined to gain her trust. But their journey is fraught with peril and Shiovra learns that darkness lurks in the hearts of her own kin.Steeped in ancient Irish myth, this tale is spun of love, war, and DEFIANCE.
author: Melissa Sasina
